history
=======


0.2.3 (2014-03-15)
------------------

Adds setting to disable stacks widget


0.2.2 (2012-12-10)
------------------

Adds Permission checks for ajax requests


0.2.1 (2012-12-10)
------------------

Adds Django-Select2 as selection field


0.2 (2012-12-10)
----------------

Initial release. Basic multilingual stacks.
